mapper.select: INSERT ALL INTO LAW VALUES('CAL',#{hname}) INTO LAW VALUES('NOSHOW',#{hname}) INTO LAW VALUES('BASIC',#{hname}) INTO LAW VALUES('RFD',#{hname}) SELECT * FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO BASIC(CHKIN, CHKOUT, LENT_UNIT, BNO, HNAME, LTYPE) VALUES(#{chkIn}, #{chkOut}, #{lentUnit}, SEQ_BNO.NEXTVAL, #{hname}, #{ltype})
INSERT INTO NOSHOW(NS_NO, NS_UNIT, NS_RATE, HNAME, LTYPE) VALUES(SEQ_NS_NO.NEXTVAL, #{nsUnit}, #{nsRate}, #{hname}, #{ltype})
INSERT INTO CAL(SVC_RATE, CAL_TIME, VAT_TYPE, HNAME, LTYPE, CAL_NO) VALUES(#{svcRate}, #{calTime}, #{vatType}, #{hname}, #{ltype}, SEQ_CAL_NO.NEXTVAL)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RFD(RFD_NO, TERM_TYPE, DAY_TYPE, RFD_DATE, RFD_RATE, HNAME, LTYPE) VALUES(SEQ_RFD_NO.NEXTVAL, 'SEASON', 'WEEK', '10', #{ seasonWeek10 }, #{hname}, 'RFD')
